name: Frontline Battery Health
description: Replacement of devices with poor hardware, memory and battery health

trend_definition.filter: airwatch.device.device_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled'  AND  airwatch.device.device_platform IN ( 'Android' )  AND  airwatch.device.device_model STARTS WITH 'Zebra'

widgets.name: Zebra Devices that Support Battery Health Metrics
Zebra Device Batteries by Charge Cycle Count
Zebra Device Batteries by Part Number

trend_definition.filter: airwatch.device.device_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled'  AND  airwatch.device.device_platform IN ( 'Android' )  AND  airwatch.device.device_zebra_battery_health BETWEEN ( 50 , 75 )

widgets.name: Zebra Device Batteries by Manufacturer Date
